attributes.action: Stop veterans paying income tax on their pensions.
attributes.additional_details: Discuss in parliament with a view to amending tax legislation under the armed force’s covenant.
attributes.background: Raise the issue to the House of Commons to help veterans by not applying an income tax code to their pension and treating it as standard income. This should form part of the counties obligation to look after its veterans; the armed forces covenant.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561969
